quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
author: Allan Bloom

quote: Education is the preparation of a child intellectually, emotionally, spiritually, and physically for life and for eternity.
author: Kevin Swanson,  Upgrade: 10 Secrets to the Best Education for Your Child

quote: Education is the light in the darkness of ignorance.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Education is the power to think clearly, the power to act well in the world's work, and the power to appreciate life.
author: Brigham Young

quote: Education is teaching our children to desire the right things.
author: Plato

quote: Education is the light switch for the mind. You have to turn it on to see the world in your own way.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Education: that which reveals to the wise, and conceals from the stupid, the vast limits of their knowledge.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Education is the progressive unfolding of our own beauty with the light of knowledge like the blooming of a flower.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To some education is just a bore; to most education is food for the brain and enrichment for the present and future.
author: Ana Monnar

quote: Education helps you to be what you really want to be.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Education, n. That which discloses to the wise and disguises from the foolish their lack of understanding.
author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Devil's Dictionary

quote: Education is beautification of the inner world and the outer world.
author: Amit Ray,  Nonviolence: The Transforming Power

quote: If you want to get educated, fall in love with learning.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To me education is a leading out of what is already there in the pupil's soul.
author: Muriel Spark,  The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie

quote: Education is the key to progress and success for human beings and for a nation.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Education exposes young people to a broader world, a world full of opportunity and hope.
author: Christine Gregoire

quote: Education enlightens you to see the beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: education is one thing and instruction, however worthy, necessary and incidentally or monetarily educative, another.
author: Kingsley Amis,  The King's English: A Guide to Modern Usage

quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
author: Anonymous

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Education either functions as an instrument which is used to facilitate integration of the younger generation into the logic of the present system and bring about conformity or it becomes the practice of freedom, the means by which men and women deal critically and creatively with reality and discover how to participate in the transformation of their world.
author: Richard Shaull,  Pedagogy of the Oppressed

quote: Education consists mainly of what we have unlearned.
author: Mark Twain,  Notebook

quote: Education: the path from cocky ignorance to miserable uncertainty.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A good education helps us make sense of the world and find our way in it
author: Mike Rose,  Why School?

quote: Education is a weapon, whose effect depends on who holds it in his hands and at whom it is aimed.
author: Joseph Stalin

quote: Education: learning to find your purpose. Upon finding your purpose: what did I learn?
author: Bauvard,  Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Education opens the door for an extraordinary life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Education isn't for getting a job. It's about developing yourself as a human being.
author: Liz Berry,  The China Garden

quote: The highest education is that which does not merely give us information but makes our life in harmony with all existence.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Education is a system of imposed ignorance.
author: Noam Chomsky,  Manufacturing Consent: The Political Economy of the Mass Media

quote: Education is a process of cultivating diamonds in a field called the mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The goal of education is to enable individuals to continue their education.
author: John Dewey

quote: Education does not mean teaching people what they do not know. It means teaching them to behave as they do not behave.
author: John Ruskin

quote: True education creates a new reality for humanity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Education enlightens our minds to see the world with new lights.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Education gives light, life and liberty.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Education is important not because it helps you to get a job, but because it opens the window of the mind through which we can see the beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Learning is an ornament in prosperity, a refuge in adversity, and a provision in old age.
author: Aristotle

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

quote: Education is the freedom of wisdom , knowledge and understanding. But been educated does not guarantee success in life, but it's the key to everlasting life.
author: Bada Aderibigbe rasak

quote: Self-education is, I firmly believe, the only kind of education there is.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: Education is the greatest gift to enlightenment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: EVERYONE NEED EDUCATION,ITS THE NEED OF A NATION,IN IT IS FUTURE'S FOUNDATION,IT LEADS TO HEARTS ASPIRATION,AND TOMORROWS INSPIRATION.
author: merlin8thomas

quote: The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Education is the process of selling someone on books.
author: Douglas Wilson

quote: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Teaching kids how to feed themselves and how to live in a community responsibly is the center of an education.
author: Alice Waters

quote: The ultimate goal of the educational system is to shift to the individual the burden of pursing his own education. This will not be a widely shared pursuit until we get over our odd conviction that education is what goes on in school buildings and nowhere else.
author: John W. Gardner
